sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { ImageBackground, StyleSheet,Image, Text, TouchableOpacity, View } from 'react-native';
import { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient';
import { TextInput } from 'react-native-gesture-handler';
import Checkbox from 'expo-checkbox';





export default class Login extends Component{


    constructor(props){
        super(props)
        this.state={
            email:'',
            password:'',
            isSelected:false

        };
        this.handleCheckboxPress = this.handleCheckboxPress.bind(this);
    }

    handleCheckboxPress(){
      const { isSelected} = this.state;
      this.setState({isSelected: !isSelected});
    }


    render(){
      const { isSelected } = this.state;
        return(
           <View style={{
            flexDirection:'column',
            height:"100%"
           }}>
            <View style={{height:"5%",width:"100%",backgroundColor:"#880606",flexDirection:"row",justifyContent:"center",alignContent:"center",alignItems:"center"}}>
               
            <TouchableOpacity style={{width:"100%",height:"100%",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center"}}>
                        <Text style={{fontFamily:"YanoneKaffeesatz",fontWeight:"600",alignSelf:"center",color:"#ffffff",fontSize:22}}>WWW.EMAAN.EDU.PK</Text>

                        </TouchableOpacity>


            </View>
            <View style={{
                height:'20%',
                width:'100%',
                flexDirection:'row',
                backgroundColor:'#ffffff',justifyContent:"center"
            }}>
                
                <View>
                    <ImageBackground source={require('./images/WhatsApp_Image_2023-02-28_at_5.37.06_PM-removebg-preview.png')}
                    style={{height:'100%',
                    width:190,
                    marginTop:15
                    }}
                    
                    ></ImageBackground>
                    
                </View>
                <View style={{justifyContent:"center",alignContent:"center",alignItems:"center",alignSelf:"center"}}>
                <Text style={{fontFamily:'YanoneKaffeesatz',fontSize:75,color:'#880606',paddingTop:10,fontWeight:"bold",textAlign:"auto"}}>EMAAN INSTITUTE</Text>
                <Text style={{fontFamily:'YanoneKaffeesatz',fontSize:48,color:'#880606',paddingTop:1,fontWeight:"bold",textAlign:"center"}}>OF MANAGEMENT & SCIENCE</Text>

                </View>
                



                
                


                
                
                
                </View>
                <View style={{height:"5%",width:"100%",backgroundColor:"#880606",flexDirection:"row",justifyContent:"center"}}>
                <View style={{alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center', backgroundColor:'transparent',height:40, width:'12%',alignSelf:'center',marginRight:10,marginLeft:3}}>
                        <TouchableOpacity style={{width:"100%",height:"100%",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center"}}>
                        <Text style={{fontFamily:"YanoneKaffeesatz",fontWeight:"600",alignSelf:"center",color:"#ffffff",fontSize:22}}>About</Text>

                        </TouchableOpacity>

                    
                    
                </View>

                <View style={{alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center', backgroundColor:'transparent',height:40, width:'12%',alignSelf:'center',marginRight:10}}>
                        <TouchableOpacity style={{width:"100%",height:"100%",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center"}}>
                        <Text style={{fontFamily:"YanoneKaffeesatz",fontWeight:"600",alignSelf:"center",color:"#ffffff",fontSize:22}}>Contact</Text>

                        </TouchableOpacity>

                    
                    
                </View>

                <View style={{alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center', backgroundColor:'transparent',height:40, width:'12%',alignSelf:'center',marginRight:20}}>
                        <TouchableOpacity style={{width:"100%",height:"100%",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center"}}>
                        <Text style={{fontFamily:"YanoneKaffeesatz",fontWeight:"600",alignSelf:"center",color:"#ffffff",fontSize:22}}>Admissions</Text>

                        </TouchableOpacity>

                    
                    
                </View>



                </View>

            <View style={{
                flexDirection:'column',height:"70%"
            }}>
   
        <View style={{flexDirection:'row',height:"100%"
    }}>
      
        <View style={{width:"50%",height:"100%"}
        
    }>
            <Image source={require('./images/311381381_982955666431550_812384766897590576_n.jpg')}
            style={{
                width:"100%",
                height:"100%",
                
            }}
            resizeMode="stretch"
            
            >


            </Image>

                    
                    
                    
                    

                </View>
                <View style={{flexDirection:'column',alignContent:"center",justifyContent:"center",alignSelf:"center",width:"50%",height:"100%",backgroundColor:"#ffffff",alignItems:"center"}}>
       <Text style={{fontFamily:'Oswald',fontSize:30,fontWeight:'bold',color:'#880606',paddingTop:10,paddingLeft:40,alignSelf:'center',fontStyle:"normal"}}>Welcome Back </Text> 
       <Text style={{fontSize:29,fontWeight:'bold',color:'#880606',paddingTop:22,paddingLeft:40,alignItems:'center',textAlign:'center'}}>EIMS Learning Management System</Text> 
       <View style={{
        

                    backgroundColor:'#EBC4FF',
                    marginTop:40,
                    height:350,
                    marginLeft:40,
                    width:550,
                    borderRadius:5,
                    shadowRadius:3,
                    alignContent:'center',
                    alignItems:'center',
                    alignSelf:'center'
                 }}>
                    <LinearGradient 
      colors={['#880606', '#6C0404']} 
      start={{
        x: 0,
        y: 0
      }}
      end={{
        x: 1,
        y: 1
      }}
      style={styles.box}>
        <Text style={{justifyContent:'center',alignContent:'center',alignSelf:'center',paddingTop:10, fontFamily:"YanoneKaffeesatz",color:'#ffffff', fontSize:22,fontWeight:200}}>LOGIN</Text>
                    <View style={styles.inputViewB}>
                        <TextInput style={
                            styles.TextInput
                        }
                        placeholder="Username"
                        placeholderTextColor="#003f5c"
                        onChangeText={(email) => this.setState({email})}
                        
                        />


                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.inputViewB}>
                        <TextInput style={
                            styles.TextInput
                        }
                        placeholder="Password"
                        placeholderTextColor="#003f5c"
                        secureTextEntry={true}
                        onChangeText={(password) => this.setState({password})}
                    
                        
                        />

                    </View>
                    <View style={{flexDirection:'row'}}>
                        <View style={{flexDirection:'row',marginTop:10,marginLeft:55 }}>
                            <Checkbox style={{alignSelf:'center',justifyContent:'space-evenly',marginRight:10,marginBottom:20,marginTop:10}}
                            value={isSelected}
                            onValueChange={this.handleCheckboxPress}
                            >
                            </Checkbox>
                        </View>
                        <Text style={{color:'#ffffff', alignContent:'center',alignSelf:'center',marginTop:20,marginBottom:20}}>Remember me</Text>
                        <TouchableOpacity style={{
                                          fontWeight:'bold',
                                          height:40,
                                          width:200,
                                          color:'#ffffff',
                                          alignItems:"center",
                                          justifyContent:"center",
                                          alignSelf:"center",
                                          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
                                          marginLeft:162,
                                          

                        }}>Forgot Password?</TouchableOpacity>

                        

                    </View>
                    <TouchableOpacity style={{
                                          fontWeight:'bold',
                                          height:40,
                                          width:200,
                                          borderLeftColor:'#FF9FFA',
                                          borderRadius:25,
                                          alignItems:"center",
                                          justifyContent:"center",
                                          alignSelf:"center",
                                          marginTop:5,
                                          backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
                                          shadowRadius:3

                        }}>Login</TouchableOpacity>
                    </LinearGradient>


                 </View>
                 <View style={{flexDirection:"row",width:580,alignSelf:"center"}}>
                    <View style={{
                                            backgroundColor:'#EBC4FF',
                                            marginTop:40,
                                            flex:1,
                                            flexDirection:"row",
                                            height:60,
                                            marginLeft:40,
                                            width:550,
                                            borderRadius:5,
                                            shadowRadius:3,
                                            alignContent:'center',
                                            alignItems:'center',
                                            alignSelf:'center'

                    }}>
                        <LinearGradient 
                              colors={['#880606', '#880606']} 
                              start={{
                                x: 0,
                                y: 0
                              }}
                              end={{
                                x: 1,
                                y: 1
                              }}
                              style={styles.box}
                        
                        >

                            <TouchableOpacity style={{
                                                                          fontWeight:'bold',
                                                                          height:60,
                                                                          width:550,
                                                                          flexDirection:"row",
                                                                          color:'#fffff',
                                                                          justifyContent:"center",
                                                                          alignSelf:"center",
                            }}>
                                                            <Image source={require('./images/7123025_logo_google_g_icon (2).png')}
                            style={{
                                height:"100%",
                                width:"10%",
                                justifyContent:'center',
                                alignSelf:'center'
                            }}
                            
                            ></Image>
                            <Text style={{justifyContent:'center',alignContent:'center',alignSelf:'center',paddingTop:5, fontFamily:"YanoneKaffeesatz",color:'#ffffff', fontSize:18,fontWeight:200}}>LOGIN WITH GOOGLE</Text>
                            


                            </TouchableOpacity>


                        </LinearGradient>


                    </View>
                    
                    
                    </View>                 
                 



       



        
        
        </View> 
        </View>

                </View>
           </View>
        );

    }
}


const styles=StyleSheet.create({
    box: {
        width: '100%',
        height: '100%',
        borderRadius:4
      },
      container: {
        flexDirection:'row',
        borderTopRightRadius:40,
        borderBottomRightRadius:40,
        borderRightWidth:20,
        borderRightColor:'#103a5e',
        justifyContent:'flex-end',
        alignContent:'flex-end',
        alignItems:'flex-end',
        marginLeft:600,
        alignSelf:'flex-end',
        width:250,height:225,
        backgroundColor: '#1a567f',
        borderRadius: 10,
        shadowColor: '#000',
        shadowOffset: {
          width: 0,
          height: 5,
        },
        shadowOpacity: 0.28,
        shadowRadius: 3.84,
        elevation: 8,
        borderStyle:''
      },
      containerB: {
        flexDirection:'row',
        borderTopRightRadius:40,
        borderBottomRightRadius:40,
        borderRightWidth:20,
        borderRightColor:'#103a5e',
        justifyContent:'flex-end',
        alignContent:'flex-end',
        alignItems:'flex-end',
        marginLeft:30,
        alignSelf:'flex-end',
        width:250,height:225,
        backgroundColor: '#1a567f',
        borderRadius: 10,
        shadowColor: '#000',
        shadowOffset: {
          width: 0,
          height: 5,
        },
        shadowOpacity: 0.28,
        shadowRadius: 3.84,
        elevation: 8,
        borderStyle:''
      },
      containerC: {
        flexDirection:'row',
        marginTop:40,
        borderTopRightRadius:40,
        borderBottomRightRadius:40,
        borderRightWidth:20,
        borderRightColor:'#103a5e',
        justifyContent:'flex-end',
        alignContent:'flex-end',
        alignItems:'flex-end',
        marginLeft:30,
        alignSelf:'flex-end',
        width:250,height:225,
        backgroundColor: '#1a567f',
        borderRadius: 10,
        shadowColor: '#000',
        shadowOffset: {
          width: 0,
          height: 5,
        },
        shadowOpacity: 0.28,
        shadowRadius: 3.84,
        elevation: 8,
        borderStyle:''
      },
    background: {
        position: 'absolute',
        left: 0,
        right: 0,
        top: 0,
        height: 350,
      },
      imageview:{
        width: 450,
        height:400,
        marginBottom:25,
        alignContent:'center',
        justifyContent:'center',
        alignItems:'center',
        alignSelf:'center'
      },
      inputViewA:{
        borderBottomWidth:2,
        borderBottomColor:'#FF595C',
        marginBottom:10,
        marginTop:30,
        alignSelf:'center',
        alignItems:'center',
        alignContent:'center',
        justifyContent:"space-evenly",
        backgroundColor: "#ffffff",
        borderRadius: 28,
        width: "15%",
        height: 55,
      },
      inputViewB:{
        marginTop:40,
        alignSelf:'center',
        alignItems:'center',
        alignContent:'center',
        justifyContent:'center',
        backgroundColor: "#ffffff",
        borderRadius: 4,
        width: "80%",
        height: 55,
      },
      TextInput:{
        alignContent:"center",
        justifyContent:"center",
        alignItems:"center",
        fontFamily:"monospace",
        width:"100%",
        paddingLeft:8,
        height:55
        
        
  
      },
      imageviewbackground:{
        height:1000,
        width:800,

      }

})
